description: When alternating between various activities, Singi Merino Henley will help you keep a comfortable body-temperature. Made from traceable Merino wool and durable nylon filament yarn, it wicks moisture away and insulates even when damp. Plus its natural anti-bacterial properties keep odors at bay, which is practical on multi-day trips when you don’t have the chance to wash so often. A great-looking  first-layer top for many types of outings.
name: Fjallraven Singi Merino Henley - Mens
